MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the G78 postcode area of Barrhead, affecting properties in Braeside Drive and surrounding areas. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 7.03pm. Repairs are taking longer than expected because of the extent of the repairs required on our underground cable network and our team are now working to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 3.00am. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 8.24pm on the 1st February 2021.
